title: Only if League of legends Graphics looked like this

embed.description: Update #8 coming soon. -------------------- Assets : Ultra Dynamic Sky | Photorealistic Mountains Pack 2 Music : Worakls - Salzburg -------------------- Contact : ewolind@live.fr

body: Jesus christ the graphics are bootiful

replies.body: The thing is, League is somewhat toaster compatible, but with those graphics, *WHOOSH,* Intel core driver computers OUT THE WINDOW, only nvidia users can play.
i use nvidia to cook my toast

I use Anivia to freeze my toast 
**cringe**
Although it may not seem it, night time graphic reduce the performance of many games as compared to day time graphics, and as said above, good bye toasters
